articles.title: ESA releases pics of dead satellite tumbling to Earth; Can it fall on someone`s head? All you need to know - WION
articles.description:
The European Space Agency (ESA) on Monday (Feb 19) released images of a dead satellite as it tumbles down to Earth in what could potentially be a fiery spectacle.

The dead satellite was part of ESA's scientific Earth-monitoring mission called ERS-2. It was l…

articles.author: Emilee Speck
articles.title: School bus-sized satellite to crash into Earth's atmosphere this week - Fox Weather
articles.description: A defunct European Space Agency 38-foot satellite will come crashing down to Earth on Wednesday, more than a decade after the spacecraft finished its mission.
articles.content: A defunct European Space Agency satellite the size of a school bus will come crashing down to Earth this week, more than a decade after the spacecraft finished its mission observing Earth's systems a… [+2482 chars]
